subject: Nobody will know bout your problems
body:
Dear customer.
It's not a secret that there are lots of online pharmacies that cheat their clients by selling fake drugs in order to make extra profits. We don't. 
The more attention you pay to your health, the more expensive it is. However, CanadianPharmacy has got something to help you with. We've got the best prices on high-quality generic medications here plus shipping discounts. CanadianPharmacy the only reliable drugstore on the Web.
CanadianPharmacy turn Canadian drug sales taxation system to your advantage
Yours,Ruthie Mcgill
